ability.Harbinger: Summons a Sandstorm for 5 turns when entering the battle.
ability.Industrious Call: Boosts the special attack by 1 stage when this Pokemon uses a Status move.

Mudslide.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Aqua Pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
